title: What if...
body: There was a button/option similar to attack move click where you press it when you want to attack the last thing you attacked? So when you're kiting and you attack move you press this button and click (or just the button or whatever) and it attacks the target you attacked before instead of the closest thing to you? I swear if theres already an option for this im the biggest stooge in the world, im just surprised it hasnt happened, to my knowledge

replies.body: There'd be no skill needed then.

hmm....i guess if rito see that as a skill and not just a misclick/misaim of the mouse which can be perfected better over time then ill accept it. if they dont care about that then its only an inconvenience for us
